Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Rear Guard Breakage hazard. Plastic guard can shatter, creating projectiles (~1.4M Units)..

Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Fire Hazard. Varistors damaged by voltage fluctuations could overheat/smolder.. EU/AU markets.

Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Motor Mount Cracking. Casting defect allowed motor to break free.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Handle Disintegration. Rubberized handle structural failure.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Laser Module Failure. Wiring vibration causes laser to fail prematurely.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Guard Return Spring. Weak spring causes guard to stay open after cut.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Blade Guard Sticking. Guard mechanism can jam and require manual intervention.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Detent Plate Wear. Soft aluminum detent plate wears out, causing inaccurate angle settings. Also fence kickback reports.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Brake System Failure. Multiple user reports of brake failing after months of use. No official recall.
